title: GSWP3-W5E5
comments: Combination of W5E5 for 1979-2016 with GSWP3 homogenized to W5E5 for 1901-1978. The homogenization reduces discontinuities at the 1978/1979 transition and was done using the ISIMIP3BASD v2.3 bias adjustment method.

title: GSWP3
comments: Dynamically downscaled and bias-adjusted 20th Century Reanalysis (20CR) from the Global Soil Wetness Project Phase 3 (GSWP3).

title: GFDL-ESM4
